thread.section_title: Cruisesalefinder Reviews | Customer Service Reviews of Cruisesalefinder | cruisesalefinder.com.au
thread.title: Rominder Singh Dodd
thread.title_full: Cruisesalefinder reviewed by Rominder Singh Dodd

author: Rominder Singh Dodd
title: Rominder Singh Dodd
text:
I’ve been booking a cruise through Cruise Republic. While I was initially sceptical – why couldn’t I just do it direct with the Cruise line, I have to say its been a really good experience. Cameron was so knowledgeable, so calm, willing to change everything when we don’t even know what we’re asking for.
Thank you very much!
